Reviews.Title: Great smartphone
Reviews.Author: Lopez Solimar Maria "Solimar, MD"
Reviews.Content: Great! Love my new smartphone, its small and so cute, very nice... Work great! Excellent for a woman. Muy feliz con mi tlf nuevo es pequeño y funciona excelente

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Oliver Sureda "topper"
Reviews.Content: Great! Is faster than 8190. Is working with an Venezuelan operator without problems.  The only think I dislike is the find my mobile service,  is only in Chinese

Reviews.Title: Great Smart buy
Reviews.Author: Mario Burbano
Reviews.Content: Great phone. Good price for the value  Not the top of the :line but great smart lhone anyway.  All I need

Reviews.Title: Good Cellphone
Reviews.Author: Pascalita
Reviews.Content: This cellphone es great for the price, i mean under 200 dollars and it does it all!. Is a must if you want a great app cellphone without expending much money on it.

Reviews.Title: The Samsung Galaxy S3 Mini GT is such a good, easy to use cell phone!!
Reviews.Author: Eben Loberg
Reviews.Content: I have used the Samsung Galaxy S3 Mini for a few months now and I really love it. I have been a keen Samsung cell phone user for at least 7 years, but the Galaxy S3 Mini is the best. If you can lay your hands on one, get it NOW and enjoy it!!

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Miosotis Giron E.
Reviews.Content: I love my new cellphone+ : camera is excellent, 5 mpx are enough for me.Totally factory unlocked, im from dominican republic and it works perfectly with CLAROSize is perfect and the performance is great.- : the battery isn't very good and sometimes i notice some lagg but for the price is okI love it

Reviews.Title: good but not great
Reviews.Author: tracey
Reviews.Content: The phone is great but the fact that my charger was missing a piece  makes me furious,now I have to get a new charger now. This should not have happen

Reviews.Title: excellent product and seller,i recommend 100 %
Reviews.Author: jose lucena
Reviews.Content: the quality its good, im very very satisfied with purchase, looking good quality, thanks for everything, i recommend 100 %.
